text: Serxhio Emini (born 3 December 2002) is an Albanian professional footballer who plays as a winger for Albanian club Luftëtari Gjirokastër.Luftëtar heroik, arbitri i vjedh fitoren ndaj Kukësit ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |+ Club statistics |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|EuropeIncluding continental competitions, such as UEFA Champions League and UEFA Europa League !colspan="2"|OtherIncluding other competitions, such as Albanian Supercup !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="1" valign="center"| Luftëtari | 2019–20 |rowspan="1"| Albanian Superliga ||1||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||1||0 |- |- !colspan="3"|Career total !1!!0!!0!!0!!colspan="2"|—!!colspan="2"|—!!1!!0 |} ==References== ==External links== * Profile FSHF.org * Category:2002 births Category:Living people Category:People from Sarandë Category:People from Vlorë County Category:Sportspeople from Vlorë Category:Association football midfielders Category:Association football forwards Category:Albanian footballers Category:Luftëtari Gjirokastër players Category:Albanian Superliga players
